While in the etherial, if you would die from contact damage, heal 300 life instead. 3 minute cooldown.
After colliding with an enemy, that enemy takes 50% more damage for 15 seconds.
Killing an enemy while in the Etherial boosts your damage by 20% for 10 seconds. Killing another enemy in this time resets the timer and stacks the bonus.
Increases your max number of minions by 2
Taking damage in the Etherial heals you for that damage instead once every 90 seconds.
Your global damage modifier is applied to your defense while in the Etherial
Super Jump Boost & Super Speed Boost while in the Etherial
Allows the use of Etherial accessories outside the Etherial.
In the Etherial, deal more damage the lower your life is
Honey provides triple the normal regen, 15 defense, and +15% damage while in the Etherial
If you are grappled to a tile in the Etherial, +50% Damage & increased life regen.

While in the etherial, prevent a hit of lethal damage once every minute. 
20% Damage Reduction

After taking damage, your damage is boosted by the percentage of your health that was taken for 10 seconds.
If this buff is still active when damage is taken again, the boost is stacked.

CHOO CHOO! While in the etherial, the faster you move, the higher your damage.
Colliding with an enemy deals your movement speed * 500 in damage.
Greatly increases Movement Speed.
Water brings you great power while in the Etherial
Attacks in the Etherial inflict 'Steamified', dealing damage over time, making enemies take more damage, and explode into cogs on death.
